song.verse: I hear Thy welcome voice,## That calls me, Lord, to Thee.## For cleansing in Thy precious blood## That flowed on Calvary.
CHORUS : I am coming, Lord,## Coming now to Thee:## Trusting only in the blood## That flowed on Calvary.
Though many weak and vile,## Thou dost my strength assure;## Thou dost my vileness fully cleanse,## Till spotless all and pure.
‘Tis Jesus calls me on## To perfect faith and love,## To perfect hope, and peace, and trust,## For earth and heav’n above.
